snippet: Despite the challenges, some of them unforeseen, throwing together a big meal can become a party unto itself.
abstract: Mark Bittman How to Cook Everything column discovers that despite the challenges, some of them unforeseen, throwing together a big meal can become a party unto itself; recipe for celeriac remoulade given.
lead_paragraph: Despite the challenges, some of them unforeseen, throwing together a big meal can become a party unto itself.

headline.seo: The Gratifying Adventure of Group Cooking
headline.main: A Gratifying Adventure in Group Cooking
headline.print_headline: A Gratifying Adventure in Group Cooking
